typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string,
		dateOfETL as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
Select1, Select2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		{Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		{Rotton Tomato},
		dateOfETL
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
source1 derive(title = upper(title)) ~> DerivedColumn1
source2 derive(title = lower(title)) ~> DerivedColumn2
